release.change: Feature - Auto complete of @mentions and #hashtags
Feature - New account switcher with picture and service icon
Feature - Added new change log (this is it!)
Feature - Added userame to the compose box
Feature - Image scaling to ensure images are under 1024x1024 (aspect ratio maintained)
Feature - Mention & DM notifications start on boot
Feature - Made links to contributors clickable
Fix - Show inline images from retweets
Fix - DM notifications load into DM lane
Fix - Retweets of Retweets now correctly stay marked as such
Fix - Correct handling of media URLs if the domain contains upper case characters
Other - Crittercism upgrade (making it easier for us to see when you have problems)
Feature - Image loader retrys the download of image if it's empty.
Feature - Status' passed from the cache to the spotlight to prevent loading
Feature - Status' updated (by way of favorite of RT) are passed back to the main feed to show this happening
Feature - Vibration setting for new notifications
Fix - Correct new tweet bar
Fix - Prevent incorrect mention counts in notifications
Fix - Profile images are "Bigger" rather than "Original" - corrects shape of images, and also reduces data to download
Fix - Mirror twitter.com functionality by excluding your own handle when replying to your own tweets
Fix - Spotlight retweets now function correctly
Fix - Retweet & Favorite dog ears now show when the event occurs and the cache is updated
Fix - Correct handling of tweet deletion to remove from the cache, rather than keep displaying
Fix - Added better handling of image downloading, with addditional error handling in an attempt to prevent this being a fatal error
Feature - Notifications for Direct Messages
Feature - Removed the cancel tweet button when composing.
Feature - Images now check for new versions every 24 hours. No more "Clear Image Cache" needed
Fix - Character count show shows on new tweets
Fix - Correct reply boxes to show correct information on exit
Fix - Lots of Twitter API v1 stuff that was missed
Feature - DashClock Support
Feature - Notification Interval - get notifications faster (at the expense of battery and data usage) or slower (save battery and data!)
Fix - Crash on startup for 4.0 devices
Fix - Only mentioning first user when replying
Fix - Profile images no longer cached forever
Fix - Crashes when loading tweets or users
Feature - Notifications for mentions!
Feature - Delete tweet/post
Feature - App.net favorites
Fix - Fix tutorial so scrolls properly (thanks AndrewCaul)
Fix - App.net posts now show if you have favorited or reposted
Other - Removed open source code from Twidere, as it was license incompatible with Tweet Lanes
